column3: Faculty of Business and Social Sciences
column5: If you want to pursue a rewarding, exciting and challenging career in the financial sector then this course provides the knowledge and skills you need, even if you do not already have experience in finance. This course is ideal if you aspire to a career in financial accounting, finance and investment. You will link these topics to issues of management and corporate strategy, studying real-life examples and case studies.This Finance MSc will give you well-integrated knowledge of management accounting and financial accounting, finance and investment; whilst developing your ability to relate these areas to the wider issues of management and corporate strategy. It produces graduates who are prepared for high-level jobs in the financial industries.
column7: Please see the university website for further information on fees for this course.
column9: 1 year full time, 2 years full time including professional placement
